verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Make me a blessing,
Make me a blessing,
Out of my life . . .
may Jesus shine; . . .

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Make me a blessing,
O Savior, I pray . . .
Make me a blessing
to someone today.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Out in the highways
and by ways of life,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Many are weary and sad; . . .
Carry the sunshine where darkness is rife,
Making the sorrowing glad . . .

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Tell the sweet story of Christ
and His love,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Tell of His pow’r to forgive; . .
Others will trust Him
if only you prove
True, ev’ry moment to live. . .

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
Be to the helpless
a helper indeed,
Unto your mission be true. . .
